articles.title: COTA delivered a great finish and also showed why NASCAR's road course officiating needs an overhaul - Yahoo Sports
articles.description: Sunday's race took longer to complete than the last two F1 races at the track combined.
articles.content:
Ross Chastain delivered a finish to remember at Circuit of the Americas with his bump of AJ Allmendinger.
